section.title: Feedback
section.para: Thank you for taking the time to provide your comments, suggestions, and bug reports to the Fedora community; this helps improve the state of Fedora, Linux, and free software worldwide. A list of commonly reported bugs and known issues for this release is available from .

section.title: Other Ways to Leave Feedback
section.para: You can learn more about the Bugzilla process at . However, if you are not comfortable leaving feedback through Bugzilla, you could also:

listitem.para: If you have a Fedora account, edit content directly at .
